description: The API of set_host_enabled was not supportted in VMWare ESXDriver, we should support this feature.
title: Enable VMWare ESXDriver support set_host_enabled

comments.content: The API of set_host_enabled was not supportted in VMWare ESXDriver, we should support this feature.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/60988
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Mark ESX driver as deprecated

Since the ESX and VC drivers actually share a lot of code, we could
keep the ESX driver.  However, after speaking with some of the VMware
team, the driver could be simplified a good bit if we just drop ESX
support since there is no intention to support it in its current form.

Instead of just pulling it now (based on the hypervisor deprecation
plan that required CI), we'll mark it deprecated for Icehouse and pull
it out for Juno.

DocImpact

Change-Id: I6553e8b39610cae78e5561e8d03a919476f0d99f
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-lau-513
